game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that a valuable artifact is hidden within an old ruin. Your quest is to locate and retrieve it, but be cautious - danger lurks around every corner.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must find the hidden entrance to the ruins, marked by a distinctive symbol刻在树干上.
A fierce creature guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
